translations.translation: The others will say, 'The truth is that you were not muminun.
They will say: "No, you were the ones who would not believe.
They will say: “Nay, you yourselves were not the ones who would believe.
Others will respond, "It was you who did not want to have any faith.
They will answer, “You yourselves did not have faith!”
They will reply: "Nay, you yourselves were not believers."
They shall say: Nay, you (yourselves) were not believers;
Those say, 'No; on the contrary, you were not believers;
They answer: Nay, but ye (yourselves) were not believers.
They will say, "No! It was you who would not believe --
They will say: nay! ye yourselves were not believers.
They will answer, ‘No, you [yourselves] had no faith.
They will reply: "Nay, ye yourselves had no Faith!
They will reply: "Nay, you yourselves were not believers.
But they reply: 'Rather, you were not believers.
They will say, “You yourselves were not believers.
The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,

[37:29] They, the ones who were followed, say, to them [the followers]: ‘On the contrary! You were [simply] not believers, for it would only be true that we led you astray if you had actually been believers [in the first place] and then rejected faith and followed us.
(They answer) the satans would answer the humans: (Nay, but ye (yourselves) were not believers) in Allah.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالُواْ } أي: الرؤساء في جواب الضعفاء: ما قولكم هذا إلا افتراء منكم إيانا ومراء، كيف نؤثر نحن في قلوبكم بحيلنا ومركنا، أو بعطائنا المال إليكم والإحسان عليكم لو كنتم مؤمنين، والإيمان من أفعال القلوب { بَلْ لَّمْ تَكُونُواْ } في أنفسكم { مُؤْمِنِينَ } [الصافات: 29] مصدقين، فتميلون على ما كنا عليه طبعاً وهوى، فتفترون اليوم علينا مراء

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { قالوا } أي: الرؤساء: { بل لم تكونوا مؤمنين } أي: بل أنتم أبيتم الإيمان، وأعرضتم عنه مع تمكُّنكم منه، مختارين للكفر، غير ملجئين إليه، أو: بل أنتم سبقت منكم الضلالة على إغوائنا، وإنما نشأ عن إغوائنا دوام كُفركم لا استئنافه
